summary: Rammstein is a German rock band formed in 1994 in Berlin. The band has six members, and their music style is called "Neue Deutsche HÃ¤rte." They gained popularity with their live shows and albums like *Herzeleid*, *Sehnsucht*, and *Mutter*. Rammstein's songs often reach the top of the charts in Germany and other countries. They are known for their energetic performances with fire and explosions. Despite some controversies, they have been very successful and have many fans worldwide.
title: Rammstein
